/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a unique perspective of a street in Beijing, China. The viewer's gaze is directed through a fisheye lens, creating a distorted view of the surroundings. The street itself is devoid of any vehicles or pedestrians, adding a sense of tranquility to the scene.

On the left side of the image, a large concrete overpass stretches across the frame. It's not just a simple overpass, but one with a curved roof that adds an architectural interest to the scene. The overpass is adorned with a large blue banner, its vibrant color contrasting with the muted tones of the concrete structure.

On the right side of the image, a row of trees lines the street, their green foliage adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day.

The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the distortion caused by the fisheye lens and gives the viewer a sense of being immersed in the scene. Despite the absence of any human presence, the image is full of life and character, offering a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing.
